skills.title: Ability to anticipate and navigate challenges
skills.description: Led the turnaround and business transformation of company, driving significant year-over-year bottom and top-line growth.

skills.title: Industry knowledge
skills.description: Two decades of experience ranging from FinTech innovation to wealth portfolio management to corporate finance for Fortune 100 companies

skills.title: Visionary
skills.description: My vision is to prepare financial firms for a soft landing into the future and create a sustainable economic future for all.

skills.title: Great communicator
skills.description: Have been recognized as a Top Business Speaker by The Huffington Post and a top CFO Influencer by Forbes.

skills.title: Team building
skills.description: Grew a team of 10,000 to 70,000 individuals over the course of 10 years. Grew network across 4 continents and 15 countries.

skills.title: Perseverance and grid
skills.description: Perseverance and dedication to continually provide confidence and clarity in this ever-changing navigation of financial management.
